publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1040 Robin Harper: Green Prime Ministerâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Indulis Emsis of the Latvian Green Party on his appointment as Prime Minister of Latvia; notes that Latvia is due to join the European Union on 1 May; recognises that Indulis Emsis is the first Green Prime Minister in world government and that his appointment reflects the growing influence of Green politics across the world, and wishes him well in his term of government.

S2M-1040 Robin Harper: Green Prime Minister-That the Parliament congratulates Indulis Emsis of the Latvian Green Party on his appointment as Prime Minister of Latvia; notes that Latvia is due to join the European Union on 1 May; recognises that Indulis Emsis is the first Green Prime Minister in world government and that his appointment reflects the growing influence of Green politics across the world, and wishes him well in his term of government.
S2M-1040 Green Prime Minister (lodged on 11 March 2004) Mark Ballard*
